original_title: Dark and Lovely, Soft and Free
overview: A road trip through gay spaces in small town South Africa, Graeme Reid's documentary introduces viewers to hairstylists, preachers, traditional healers, and beauty queens. This moving film provides an alternative vision of acceptance and celebration, in contrast to the wave of homophobia that is sweeping across sub-Saharan Africa.

production_companies.name: Gay and Lesbian Archives of South Africa

title: Dark and Lovely, Soft and Free
